law.text: The Secretary may enter every place, vehicle, or conveyance in the State, where cantaloupes are stored, packed, delivered for shipment, loaded, shipped, transported, offered or exposed for sale, or sold in closed containers. He may inspect any cantaloupe found in any of these places and take for inspection any representative sample of the cantaloupes and any container necessary to determine whether this subtitle is violated. The Secretary may mark any container found in any place, vehicle, or conveyance for future identification.
